chapter.title: NSCLDAQ Manager subsystem (new in 12.0)
chapter.para: As the FRIB begins operating, security concerns are moving the laboratory away from employing a single experiment account from which an experiment is run. Instead, with the NSCLDAQ manager subystem, the persistent software in an experiment can be run by a single account but controlled by users logged in to accounts.
This chapter provides a description of this facility and how to use it. The chapter references man pages and reference information where appropriate.
The sections in the chapter are organized as follows:

listitem.para: Provides introductory information that's useful for understanding the remainder of the presentation.
